messages.title: People and Planet before Privilege
messages.content: I understand how hard it is for ordinary working people. I’m the daughter of an Ambulance Driver, I started my working life in Truro as an apprentice BT engineer. I went to a state school and now my children are attending a state school here in the constituency. I want to improve the lives of ordinary people in this constituency. Let’s fully fund our schools and NHS and free them from privatisation. Let’s make sure climate catastrophe is avoided and our children have a future to look forward to.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour Can Keep The Tories Out!
